name: Death Girl Mows the Lawn
description:
A month after the passing of her sister, F.G goes on a quest for personal discovery, by taking on the persona of her favorite anime character, DEATH GIRL. Accompany her throughout her day, as she asks herself a lot of tough questions, but mainly dances around her dad's farm cutting grass with a scythe.

NOTE: In order to run this game, you will require the RPGXP RTP, which has to be downloaded manually. You can retrieve this RTP from this link: http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages
